privacyComplianceList: This is a Software Development Kit and it does not collect, store or process any user data. It is up to the developers who use this in the products they build to ensure they adhere to relevant privacy policies.
adherenceSteps: This is a Software Development Kit and it does not collect, store or process any user data. It is up to the developers who use this in the products they build to ensure they adhere to relevant privacy policies.

bestPracticesList: Use Open Standards, Open Data, Open Source, and Open Innovation

preventHarm.additionalInfoMechanismProcessesPolicies: The SDK incorporates specific features like on-device encryption of data and recommends best practices - https://github.com/google/android-fhir/wiki/FEL%3A-Privacy-%26-security

dataPrivacySecurity.privacySecurityDescription:
This is a Software Development Kit and it does not collect, store or process any user data. It is up to the developers who use this in the products they build to ensure they adhere to relevant privacy policies.
The project specifically provides guidance around privacy and security for developers - https://github.com/google/android-fhir/wiki/FEL%3A-Privacy-%26-security
